luna 0.1.0

Create a single regimen

Source: R/create_regimen.R
create_regimen.Rd

The resulting data.frame can be passed to luna::run_sim() as the regimen argument.

Usage

create_regimen(
  dose,
  interval = 24,
  n,
  t_inf = NULL,
  route = c("oral", "iv", "sc", "im")
)

Examples


if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
reg1 <- create_regimen(
  dose = 500,
  interval = 12,
  n = 10,
  route = "oral"
)
luna::run_sim(..., regimen = reg1)
} # }
